snippet: The switch to sell only LED bulbs in its stores, part of the company’s overall sustainability efforts, will begin Sept. 1.
abstract: Ikea announces that it will only sell LED bulbs as of Sept 1, eliminating sales of incandescent, halogen and compact fluorescent bulbs; change comes amid company's overall sustainability efforts.
lead_paragraph: The switch to sell only LED bulbs in its stores, part of the company’s overall sustainability efforts, will begin Sept. 1.

headline.main: Ikea to Replace All Lighting on Shelves With LED Bulbs
headline.print_headline: Ikea Commits to LED Bulbs, Exclusively, and Energy Plan
